commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: You were scouted?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Yeah. The three of us were just out walking, and someone came and asked if we'd help out as models for some photos. Right?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Yeah, it really happened, Dia.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: People can't let my cuteness pass them by even if I'm just walking down the street.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I intended to be out of super-idol mode since I wasn't on stage, but I just can't hide my aura.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Aura, huh.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What's that look for? If you've got something to say, say it to my face!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Nothing, really.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Oh no, your eyes say you don't believe me. Look, I even got her business card!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: It looks like it's actually true.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: See? This is what I'm made of!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Yeah, yeah. Awesome, totally awesome.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You're not even taking me seriously! Well, fine. We're going to become models, get known by all the world and win a ton of fans, you'll see!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah. Just thinking of me in a kimono, I can see them going crazy over how cute I am! Everyone'll be talking about me! *Giggle*

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: That might give us an advantage in the School Idol Festival, too.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Of course it would. In other words, this is a mission we can't afford to lose!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: You're going to take the job?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Can you think of a reason to turn it down?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Do things like these usually go over well? Are you sure about this?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What do you mean?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Like, what if they charge you for the outfits later?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Huh?! B-But...would I have enough allowance for that?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: There's a lot of danger in Tokyo, Ruby. You need to be able to discern those out to deceive you.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hey! Are you trying to ruin our big chance?!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Well, no, that is not my intention, but...I am worried, I must say.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Then how about you come with us? And you, too, Maki.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Why me?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: If you take notes on how cute I am, you might be scouted next!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I'd really rather not.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Then it's settled! I'll let the agency know.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: W-Wait, you're...just going to do it? Fine.
